{{WPMILHIST |class=B|B1=y|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y |British-task-force=yes |Weaponry-task-force=yes |WWI-task-force=yes |Memorials-task-force=yes }}
== Changed tag for references ==
This article was tagged with a "unreferenced" tag in October 2012, but when I read it in August 2013 it clearly had two references. I therefore changed the tag to "refimprove". In particular, the description of the original formation could really use some additional citations. — [[User:Molly-in-md|Molly-in-md]] ([[User talk:Molly-in-md|talk]]) 14:38, 20 August 2013 (UTC)
== Purpose ==
Hello, I would like to read about the exact purpose of the mine, what was the context of its use. Kind regards [[User:Ziko|Ziko]] ([[User talk:Ziko|talk]]) 15:05, 27 May 2014 (UTC)
== Expansion == Capture of La Boisselle has been written and Lochnagar expanded a little [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 16:15, 19 October 2014 (UTC) :I have assessed this as C class. Clarification of the term "glory hole" and what it is used for could improve the "1915" section. If you do this I will re-assess as B class. Linking the term [[glory hole]] does not seem to fit the context of this article, but I could be wrong. I have made some small corrections as to formatting and removel of an extra word; otherwise, the article looks fine. One might consider linking the term [[Y Sap mine]] if a future article is contemplated. [[User:Cuprum17|Cuprum17]] ([[User talk:Cuprum17|talk]]) 18:59, 20 October 2014 (UTC)
::'Tis done[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 19:39, 20 October 2014 (UTC)
== External links modified ==
Hello fellow Wikipedians,
I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Lochnagar mine]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=698971146 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100603052644/http://www.remuseum.org.uk:80/corpshistory/rem_corps_part14.htm to http://www.remuseum.org.uk/corpshistory/rem_corps_part14.htm#westernfront
When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know.
{{sourcecheck|checked=false}}
Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|<sup style="color:green;font-family:Courier">cyberbot II]]<small><sub style="margin-left:-14.9ex;color:green;font-family:Comic Sans MS">[[User talk:Cyberbot II|<span style="color:green">Talk to my owner]]:Online</sub></small> 11:56, 9 January 2016 (UTC)
== Pics etc ==
@Vi, are we not risking over-stuffing the article? could some pics go into the gallery? Regards [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 10:39, 22 September 2016 (UTC)
== Edit ==
What's misleading? [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 21:47, 30 September 2016 (UTC)
:Just got an edit conflict so I'll keep out for a while; apols. Regards [[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 12:41, 8 November 2016 (UTC)
